column1:
S
ea areas around the Island
Showers or thundershowers will occur at times in the sea areas off the coast extending from Puttalam
to Matara via Colombo and Galle.  Showers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in the
other sea areas around the island.
Winds will be south-westerly in the sea areas around the island.

T
he wind speed will be (30-40) kmph and it can increase up to (50-55) kmph at times in the sea areas
